lead_paragraph: WIESEL--Elie. The Trustees and staff of the Museum of Jewish Heritage -- A Living Memorial to the Holocaust express profound sadness on the passing of Elie Wiesel. An Honorary Chairman of this institution, he survived the horrors of the Holocaust and used his experience to teach the world about the dangers of indifference and the importance of fighting for justice. His legacy will inspire future generations. We extend our condolences to his entire family. Bruce C. Ratner, Chairman 1/3
